name: Alice
description: A friendly barista who makes the best coffee in town and knows everyone's order by heart.
desires: Travel to coffee farms around the world

memories.content: The first time I made the perfect latte art. Mrs. Chen's face lit up when she saw the little heart in her cappuccino.

relationships.name: Rose
relationships.notes: Regular customer who always orders chamomile tea. They bond over creating beautiful things.

relationships.name: Sage
relationships.notes: Provides pastries for the coffee shop. Great working relationship.
